Effective Date for Reduction of Chapter 18 Benefits
Whenever it is necessary to reduce, or discontinue a monthly allowance, generally reduce or discontinue based on the facts found, except as provided in
38 CFR 3.105(g)
, and
38 CFR 3.114(b)
.
The table below provides information to determine the correct effective date of a reduction or discontinuation.
If benefits were paid erroneously due to ...
Then the effective date of the reduction or discontinuation is the date of ...
beneficiary error
the erroneous award.
VA administrative error
last payment.
